rules.text: This is a great place to post info and pics about you! Adult content is allowed here, buy ONLY WITH A CONTENT WARNING and MARKED AS SENSITIVE. This includes artwork and text that is of adult nature.
This is a terrible place to dump all the random porn you've found around the internet. Please find a different Mastodon server that can afford to host it all for you. Or better yet, stay on Twitter.
No spam, advertising, or copyrighted work
Avatar and Profile header should not have nudity or contain offense image or language.
By signing up you are certifying that you are over 18 years of age. If you are under 18 years old, please find a different server.

If any pictures or drawings posted looks even slightly underage we will ban and report your account details to the authorities without hesitation. When in doubt, don't even THINK about posting or boosting it here.

records.text: A family fought to trace its family tree. Now, it is being shown at the Library of CongressThis week, the nation commemorated Juneteenth, which recognizes the end of slavery in the United States. For many African-American families, it can be a challenge to trace their lineage, but one Virginia family fought and found a way. Now, their family tree is on display at the nation's oldest cultural institution: The Library of Congress.https://www.cbsnews.com/video/a-family-fought-to-trace-its-family-tree-now-it-is-being-shown-at-the-library-of-congress/
